addCustomerAttempt: User attempts to add customer with name '%s'.
addItemAttempt: User attempts to add cargo of type '%s' -> owner: '%s', value: %s, duration of storage: %s, hazards: %s, pressurized: %s, fragile: %s.
removeItemAttempt: User attempts to remove cargo at position '%d'.
relocateItemAttempt: User attempts to relocate item at position '%d' to position '%d'.
inspectCargoAttempt: User attempts to inspect cargo at position '%d'.
saveItemAttempt: User attempts to save the item at position '%d'.
loadItemAttempt: User attempts to load the item at position '%d'.
listCargosAttempt: User attempts to list cargos filtered by type '%s'.
listHazardsAttempt: User attempts to list hazards. Inclusive: %s
